hero.title: Data Management Platform
hero.desc: Safe, fast, and easily scalable in the AI era.

featuresPage.title: Features Overview
featuresPage.subtitle: A complete data management system with all the tools your business needs

crud.title: Data CRUD
crud.description: Easily create, read, update, and delete data with an intuitive interface.

userRole.title: User Management & Roles
userRole.description: Role-based access control: Admin, Staff, User for security and flexibility.

report.title: Reports & Analytics
report.description: Visualize data through charts, tables, and modern dashboards.

sync.title: Sync & Integration
sync.description: Support API integration and multi-platform data synchronization.

security.title: Advanced Security
security.description: User authentication, data protection, and change history tracking.

featuresPage.highlightDesc: Beyond CRUD, the system also provides reporting, role-based access, security, and multi-platform synchronization.

confirmModal.title: Confirm Action
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

cli.title: UserManager Security
cli.subtitle1: Comprehensive data management and security solution.
cli.subtitle2: Integrates technology and automated analysis to detect, assess, and fix system vulnerabilities.

feature1.title: Secure Storage
feature1.desc: AES-256 encryption, GDPR and SOC2 compliant.

feature4.title: Detailed Permissions
feature4.desc: RBAC & ABAC for millions of users.

feature5.title: Scalability
feature5.desc: Supports millions of transactions per second.
